DayLimitLock() DayLimitLockApplication_Green_Quake.ViewModels.SecurityMethods Application_Green_Quake.ViewModels.SecurityMethodsDayLimitLock
async Task<bool> Application_Green_Quake.ViewModels.SecurityMethods.DayLimitLock ( )
This function gets the date and the count from the SecurityChecks Node in the database and compares the stored date to the current date. If the count is 15 and the date is the same as todays date the function returns true. Otherwise False. Returns
value return true/false
Definition at line 34 of file SecurityMethods.cs.
TimeLimitLock() TimeLimitLockApplication_Green_Quake.ViewModels.SecurityMethods Application_Green_Quake.ViewModels.SecurityMethodsTimeLimitLock
async Task<bool> Application_Green_Quake.ViewModels.SecurityMethods.TimeLimitLock ( )
This function gets the time from the SecurityChecks Node in the database and compares the stored time to the current time. The time difference is found by subtracting the time stored in the database from the current time and if the difference is not greater than or equal to 60 seconds then the function returns true otherwise it returns false. Returns
value return true/false
